ctx: intros x y d Hx Hgcd.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y, d : nat Hx : x > 0 Hgcd : gcd (Z.of_nat x) (Z.of_nat y) d The term "exist ?P 0 ?y" has type "{x : nat | ?P x}" while it is expected to have type "(Z * Z)%type".

ctx: intros x y d Hx Hgcd.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y, d : nat Hx : x > 0 Hgcd : gcd (Z.of_nat x) (Z.of_nat y) d Unable to unify "Z.of_nat (?M1410 * ?M1411) = (Z.of_nat ?M1410 * Z.of_nat ?M1411)%Z" with "{a : Z * Z | Z.of_nat d = (Z.of_nat x * fst a + Z.of_nat y * snd a)%Z}".

original: intros x y d Hx Hgcd. exists (exist _ 0 _). simpl. apply Nat2Z.inj_mul. symmetry. apply inj_eq. reflexivity.
